title: A Crypto Bankruptcy Could Be Investors’ Nightmare
sub_head: Few safeguards are in place for individual investors should a digital asset platform file for chapter 11 protection
body:
The cryptocurrency market’s latest swoon is giving investors a painful lesson about the risks of trading digital tokens through intermediaries.
Sliding digital asset values pushed lending service Celsius Networks LLC this week to freeze all customer withdrawals and explore options that include a financial restructuring.
